location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Lieutenant William Bruce, Acting Resident, Bushire, to Sir Evan Nepean, President and Governor in Council, Bombay

mods.abstract: Letter encloses a translation of a firmaun [firman], dated 19 April 1813, from His Royal Highness Hossain Ali Murza [Ḥusayn ‘Alī Mīrzā], Prince at Sheraz [Shiraz], to William Bruce, requesting that Bruce take measures to have the Rahime Shaw(also spelled Rahminshaw) and all other vessels belonging to Mahomed Neuby Khan [Muhammad Nabi Khan, former Governor of Bushire] brought to Bushire and delivered over to Mahomed Hossain Khan Kuraqoorloo, Acting Governor of Bushire. The translation appears directly before the letter in the volume.
